about_the_game:
“In a world burning down around you, what would you do to save the one place you have left?”


Tactical Turn-Based RPG
Bullet Maidens is a tactical turn-based shooter with RPG and visual novel elements. Help a squad of Taiwanese schoolgirls trying to keep their school and classmates safe while a war against an unknown and seemingly unstoppable army wages across the world.


Tactics with a Twist
You are in control! Help the girls fight and survive in many hand crafted levels using an innovative combat system that doesn't rely on probabilities.


Adapt and Customize
Earn powerful upgrades that can be applied as you want to help you survive each encounter. Find hidden synthesis combos to get the edge over enemies. Dress the girls in unlockable outfits and capture them in photos.


Thrilling Occult Mystery Story
Follow the twists and turns of a dramatic story as each girl attempts to face the new situation they are in. As things get darker and more desperate, the girls will discover a deeper level of reality than they had ever known before and the horrors that dwell there.

Lead them to the final revelation that may be their only salvation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 SP 1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3220 @ 3.3 GHz, AMD FX 4300 @ 3.8 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8.0 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 650 with 1 GB VRAM or AMD Radeon HD 7750 with 1 GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible using the latest drivers
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Protect a school from demon soldiers. Battle followers of the occult. Discover a chilling revelation that just might lead to doom...or salvation? A turn-based tactical shooter that doesn't rely on luck about Taiwanese schoolgirls saving their refuge in a world at war.
supported_languages:
English*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
